greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of numbers less than n having the same sum of digits.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 0..1500 from Reinhard Zumkeller)
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
maple: N:= 1000: # to get a(0) to a(N)
for n from 1 to N do
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(sdn=sumdigits(n)); sum(k=1, n-1, sumdigits(k) == sdn); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 26 2017
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2008
